mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID, NAME, TYPE, ICON, PAGE_INFO_ID, UPPER_MENU_ID, INDEX FROM MENU

SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.NAME, M.TYPE, M.ICON, P.NAME AS PAGE_INFO_NAME, P.PATH AS PAGE_INFO_PATH, P.ID AS PAGE_INFO_ID, M.ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, M.UPPER_MENU_ID, M.INDEX FROM MENU M LEFT OUTER JOIN PAGE_INFO P ON M.PAGE_INFO_ID = P.ID ORDER BY INDEX ASC

SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.NAME, M.TYPE, M.ICON, P.NAME AS PAGE_INFO_NAME, P.PATH AS PAGE_INFO_PATH, P.ID AS PAGE_INFO_ID, M.ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, M.UPPER_MENU_ID, M.INDEX FROM MENU M LEFT OUTER JOIN PAGE_INFO P ON M.PAGE_INFO_ID = P.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLE_ID = R.ID WHERE R.LEVEL >= #{level} ORDER BY INDEX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU (MENU_ID, NAME, TYPE, ICON, PAGE_INFO_ID, UPPER_MENU_ID, INDEX, ROLE_ID) VALUES (#{menuId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{pageInfoId}, #{upperMenuId}, #{index}, #{roleId})
